data.title: 50 Alfred Hitchcock Trivia Quizzes
data.text:
FREE! Click here to Join FunTrivia. Thousands of games, quizzes, and lots more!

Alfred Hitchcock Trivia

Alfred Hitchcock Trivia Quizzes

Home

»

Quizzes

»

Movie Trivia

»

People Themed E-K

Here you'll find a mixed bag of questions about movies directed by the Master of Suspense. (If you are looking for quizzes about individual movies, look in the alphabetical section for the title.)

50 Alfred Hitchcock quizzes and 700 Alfred Hitchcock trivia questions.

Sub-Categories:

Hitchcock Cameos (9 quizzes)

Hitchcock Taglines (2)

1.

Hitchcock Movies

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Alfred Hitchcock was, and ever will be, the Master of Suspense. I'll give you a brief description of the plot, and you tell me which movie it is.

Average, 10 Qns, skunkee, Oct 12 13

Average

skunkee

9913 plays

10 Qns

10 Qns

10 Hitchcock's Leading Ladies Questions

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

The Master of Suspense had a penchant for beautiful blonde leading ladies, the more mysterious, the better. See if you can match the actress with the movie she stars in. An actress may be in more than one film.

Memorable Hitchcock Movie Moments: Reel 1

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

As a director Alfred Hitchcock made the transition from silent movies to the talkies and was responsible for many of our best-remembered movies. See how many you can name from these dramatic cinema moments.

The Best of Alfred Hitchcock

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Hitchcock was master of suspense and a respected director, though apparently not so much by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts & Sciences, if his Oscar wins are any indication. Let's look at some of Hitch's best and the directors that beat him out!

The Wondrous Works of Alfred Hitchcock

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Before coming to America in 1939, Alfred Hitchcock had established himself as one of the best in the business. He directed over 30 movies in Europe, and more than 25 in Hollywood. Let's see what you know about "The Master of Suspense" and his films.

Hitchcock Quotes

10 Qns

This quiz presents quotes from 10 of Alfred Hitchcock's greatest films. I'll give you the quote, you give me the movie. If you're a Hitchcock fan, this should be a breeze. If you're not a Hitchcock fan, you should be!
